name: Chain Saw Confidential L.E.
description:
August 18, 1973

 Tragedy befell a group of five youths, in particular Sally Hardesty and her invalid brother, Franklin. It is all the more tragic in that they were young. But, had they lived very, very long lives, they could not have expected nor would they have wished to see as much of the mad and macabre as they were to see that day. For them an idyllic summer afternoon drive became a nightmare.

 The events of that day were to lead to the discovery of one of the most bizarre crimes in the annals of American history, The Texas Chain Saw Massacre.

August 18, 2013

 Critically-acclaimed author Gunnar Hansen tells the real story of the making of the film, its release, and reception, offering unknown behind-the-scenes details, a harrowingly entertaining account of the adventures of low-budget filmmaking, illuminating insights on the film's enduring and influential place in the horror genre and our culture, and a thoughtful meditation on why we love to be scared in the first place.

 Order Now and receive an exclusive, limited edition cover by artist Christopher Ott. The limited edition piece is available as an exclusive at Mad Monster Party Gras, New Orleans. September 13th-15th. 125 copies are available to attendees of the show, with an additional 25 copies available for shipping, only through London 1888. 

Hardcover: 240 pages
16-page full-color photo insert

FREE SHIPPING (unless international)

Image 1 is the front cover
Image 2 is the complete cover when unfolded

name: Dream Warriors 18 x 24
description: "Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors" by Christopher Ott Freddy's Back... this time the Dream Warriors are ready to fight. After such an overwhelming response to our first Nightmare poster, we're glad to be coming back for another. 5 Color Screen Printed 18 x 24. On Black, Mr. French Cardstock. Limited Edition of 200. Each is signed and numbered by artist Christopher Ott. When they are gone, they are gone. Tube shipped, in a Yazoo Mills tube, with extra care to prevent any possible damage. name: Final Chapter 18 x 24
description: The Final Chapter by Christopher Ott We did this for a Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter reunion at HorrorHound Weekend. The reunion featured Corey Feldman and Ted White, who played Jason. We presented Corey with the #1 of 200 prints. We also presented Ted White with the #2 of 200. Check out the picture of us giving Corey his print. 18 x 24, 4 color screen print, printed on sturdy, black French Paper card stock. Signed and numbered. Shipped in a Yazoo Mills Tube for extra protection.

name: The Crow 18x24
description: The Crow by Christopher Ott We did this for a recent The Crow cast reunion. The reunion featured Ernie Hudson, Rochelle Davis, Tony Todd, Laurence Mason, and Michael Massee. Prints 1-5 were given to the cast members. 18 x 24, 4 color screen print, printed on sturdy, black French Paper card stock. Metallic Red ink. Signed and numbered by the artist. Shipped in a Yazoo Mills Tube for extra protection. These posters are on hand and ready to ship.

The Glow-In-The-Dark writing features all of your favorite quotes by the man of your dreams, as well as many reminders to not fall asleep. 6 Color Screen Printed 18 x 24. name: Nightmare 18x24 1 AVAILABLE!!
description: "Nightmare on Elm Street" by Christopher Ott We have located 1 last print. This one goes to the first buyer!! I want to thank all of you, for this poster doing so well. The Nightmare on Elm Street reunion at Spooky Empire's Ultimate Horror Weekend was a great success. We presented Robert Englund with 1/200 and he replied, "Brother, this is my FAVORITE." The poster now adorns the wall in his office. We've posted a picture of him signing the poster for some attendees at the show. 5 Color Screen Printed 18 x 24. On Black, Mr. French Cardstock. Limited Edition of 200 for upcoming event. We only have 50 available for sale on the internet. Each is signed and numbered. When they are gone, they are gone. Tube shipped, in a Yazoo Mills tube, with extra care to prevent any possible damage.

name: Gift Cards
description: You will receive a printable gift certificate in your email box. The certificate will have a unique code that you can use at checkout on a future purchase. Gift Cards can be used on our site or in person, and do not expire.

We were fortunate enough to have these on hand when meeting up with Angus Scrim recently. We presented Angus with the #1 of 200 prints. We also presented Reggie with the #3, and Mike with #2. The "Sphere" color is a Metallic silver.... and it looks ABSOLUTELY SICK!! THESE ARE IN HAND AND BEGIN SHIPPING RIGHT AWAY! 9 x 24, 4 color screen print, printed on sturdy, black French Paper card stock. Signed and numbered. Shipped in a Yazoo Mills Tube for extra protection.
